snippet: A new entrant from Dropbox, Carousel, looked promising, but fell short. A raft of others all have strengths, but nothing offers everything you want.
abstract: Molly Wood Machine Learning column compares and contrasts several different mobile applications for organizing, backing up and sharing mobile photo collections.
lead_paragraph: A new entrant from Dropbox, Carousel, looked promising, but fell short. A raft of others all have strengths, but nothing offers everything you want.

headline.main: The Best Photo Organizing App? I’m Still Looking
headline.print_headline: The Best Photo Organizing App? I’m Still Looking
